title: Kafka Dispatcher Config
description: Configuration for the Kafka dispatcher plugin

topic.description: Kafka topic to publish messages to

key.description: Message key expression (supports $request.header.X-Key, $request.path.id, or literal value)

body.description: JSON body for the acknowledgment response

headers.description: Additional headers for the acknowledgment response

include_metadata.description: Include publish metadata (partition, offset) in response

headers_from_request.description: Request headers to pass as Kafka message headers
